verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* to my \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*: in thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* me, \add and\add* in thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

And \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* not into \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* with thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: for in thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* shall no man \w living|strong="H2416"\w* be \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*.

For the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* hath \w persecuted|strong="H7291"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; he hath \w smitten|strong="H1792"\w* my \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w down|strong="H1792"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*; he hath made me to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H4285"\w*, as those that have been \w long|strong="H5769"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.
Therefore is my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w overwhelmed|strong="H5848"\w* within me; my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* me is \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*.

I \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*; I \w meditate|strong="H1897"\w* on all thy \w works|strong="H6467"\w*; I \w muse|strong="H7878"\w* on the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

I stretch \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* unto thee: my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add thirsteth\add* after thee, as a \w thirsty|strong="H5889"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H6030"\w* me \w speedily|strong="H4118"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w faileth|strong="H3615"\w*: \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* not thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from me, lest I be \w like|strong="H4911"\w* unto them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.\f + \fr 143.7 \ft lest…: or, for I am become like, etc\f*

Cause me to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; for in thee do I \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*: cause me to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w wherein|strong="H2098"\w* I should \w walk|strong="H3212"\w*; for I lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* unto thee.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, from mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: I flee unto thee to \w hide|strong="H3680"\w* me.\f + \fr 143.9 \ft flee…: Heb. hide me with thee\f*

\w Teach|strong="H3925"\w* me to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w will|strong="H7522"\w*; for thou \add art\add* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: thy \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* me into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w uprightness|strong="H4334"\w*.

\w Quicken|strong="H2421"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for thy \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake: for thy \w righteousness’|strong="H6666"\w* sake \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* out of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.

And of thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* cut \w off|strong="H6789"\w* mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* all them that \w afflict|strong="H6887"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: for I \add am\add* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.
